main.description: List recipeExchanges. Filterable by: recipeStipulates, recipeStipulatesReciprocal.

uri.description: Fetch a single record by AT-URI. Other filters are ignored when set.

recipeStipulates.description: Filter where recipeStipulates array contains this AT-URI.

recipeStipulatesReciprocal.description: Filter where recipeStipulatesReciprocal array contains this AT-URI.

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor from a previous response.
